contribution.purpose: National and administrative level risk assessment

description: SWIO RAFI Madagascar Tropical Cyclone Pluvial Flood

events.description: MDG TC Pluvial Flood 10yr event, depth (mm)

footprints._cf1_fp_data_query: ST_SetSRID(ST_Point(lon,lat), 4326) AS the_geom, i10_year / 1000 AS intensity FROM paul.tc_mdg_fpf
